name: Build a Face
description:
CONTROLS:

Select: Left mouse Button

Drag and drop elements: Left mouse Button

Rotate left:  A / left arrow

Rotate right: D/right arrow

Expand: W/ up arrow

Shrink: S/down arrow

Developed based on my Build a Head game. 

You can customise your own character or person, just with the same restriction that people also will have while taking a test for face blindness: you can only see the facial features. No hair, no body. But because that's a little boring and you deserve to play with colors, there's a color option (https://unitylist.com/p/qes/Unity-Color-Picker This is where I got this amazing color picker tool! It's free and it's awesome and you need it)

This game is part of my prosopagnosia (face blindness) collection.
